name: Delivery Truck Empire
description:
Delivery Truck Empire is the casual strategy game that you didn't know you'd been waiting for.

Your mission is to pick-up & deliver packages for the citizens of Delivery Town.

Drive a truck through more than a dozen regions, collecting packages and power-ups.

Deliver packages to earn credits to upgrade your truck and your town.

When you upgrade your truck, you'll be able to move faster and carry more packages, but you'll still have to drive carefully to select the best path through town and avoid other cars.

When you upgrade your town, you'll receive more valuable packages to deliver, but you'll still have to be careful not to run out of fuel.

Hurry! Delivery Town needs you!


-

Delivery Truck Empire is a universal app, and is compatible with iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch devices running iOS 5 or greater.

Delivery Truck Empire is brought to you by your friends at Playtend.

Got feedback? We'd love to hear from you!

Love the game? Spread the word!
